entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries or rain showers near midnight and ending before morning then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 17 April 2023
